Some common 
breastfeeding problems and 
how to solve them
It can be hard to ask for help, 
but tackling any problems as 
soon as they start will help 
you to enjoy these early days. 
In lots of cases, the solution 
is as simple as changing your 
baby’s position slightly or 
feeding them a bit more often.
Unsettled feeding
If your baby is unsettled at 
the breast and doesn’t seem 
satisfied	by
